artist: Engraver: Richard Earlom; Draftsman: after Claude de Lorraine; Publisher: John Boydell

Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription: LL, in margin below image, lettered: Claude le Lorrain delin\'t. / No. 10. | BC, in margin below image, lettered:  Published Jan. 1st 1774 by John Boydell Engraver in Cheapside. / From the Original Drawing, in the Collection of the Duke of Devonshire. | LR, in margin below image, lettered: R. title: The Roman Forum or Campo Vaccino with the Arch of Septimus Severus and the Temple of Jupiter Stator
